Key.name: north
Key.script: if huntVar.on then t.send("cq all##queue add eqbal go north") elseif gmcp.Room.Info.environment == "Vessel" then expandAlias("c n") else TReX.config.compass("n") end

Key.name: south
Key.script: if huntVar.on then t.send("cq all##queue add eqbal go south") elseif gmcp.Room.Info.environment == "Vessel" then expandAlias("c s") else TReX.config.compass("s") end

Key.name: east
Key.script: if huntVar.on then t.send("cq all##queue add eqbal go east") elseif gmcp.Room.Info.environment == "Vessel" then expandAlias("c e") else TReX.config.compass("e") end

Key.name: west
Key.script: if huntVar.on then t.send("cq all##queue add eqbal go west") elseif gmcp.Room.Info.environment == "Vessel" then expandAlias("c w") else TReX.config.compass("w") end

Key.name: northeast
Key.script: if huntVar.on then t.send("cq all##queue add eqbal go northeast") elseif gmcp.Room.Info.environment == "Vessel" then expandAlias("c ne") else TReX.config.compass("ne") end

Key.name: southeast
Key.script: if huntVar.on then t.send("cq all##queue add eqbal go southeast") elseif gmcp.Room.Info.environment == "Vessel" then expandAlias("c se") else TReX.config.compass("se") end

Key.name: southwest
Key.script: if huntVar.on then t.send("cq all##queue add eqbal go southwest") elseif gmcp.Room.Info.environment == "Vessel" then expandAlias("c sw") else TReX.config.compass("sw") end

Key.name: northwest
Key.script: if huntVar.on then t.send("cq all##queue add eqbal go northwest") elseif gmcp.Room.Info.environment == "Vessel" then expandAlias("c nw") else TReX.config.compass("nw") end

Key.name: up
Key.script: if huntVar.on then t.send("cq all##queue add eqbal go up") elseif string.starts(gmcp.Room.Info.name,"Quarterdeck ") then t.send("climb mast") return elseif gmcp.Room.Info.environment == "Vessel" then send("queue add eqbal up") return else TReX.config.compass("up") end

Key.name: down
Key.script:
if huntVar.on then t.send("cq all##queue add eqbal go down")
elseif gmcp.Room.Info.name == "Crow's nest" then t.send("climb mast")
elseif gmcp.Room.Info.name == "In the rigging above Ship bow" then send("queue add eqbal down")
elseif gmcp.Room.Info.name == "In the rigging above Main deck" then send("queue add eqbal down")
elseif gmcp.Room.Info.name == "In the rigging above Stern" then send("queue add eqbal down")
elseif gmcp.Room.Info.name == "In the rigging above Side deck" then send("queue add eqbal down")
elseif gmcp.Room.Info.environment == "Vessel" then send("queue add eqbal down")
else TReX.config.compass("down") end

Key.name: in
Key.script: if huntVar.on then t.send("cq all##queue add eqbal go in") elseif gmcp.Room.Info.environment == "Vessel" then t.send("queue add eqbal in") else TReX.config.compass("in") end

Key.name: out
Key.script: if huntVar.on then t.send("cq all##queue add eqbal go out") elseif gmcp.Room.Info.environment == "Vessel" then t.send("queue add eqbal out") else TReX.config.compass("out") end

Key.name: start the killing spree
Key.script: if not huntVar.on then huntVar.on = true end if not huntVar.targetGone then t.serverside.green_echo("<green>[<white>Data<green>]<white>: Level: <green>"..gmcp.Char.Status.level) TReX.hunting.rotation() else t.serverside.green_echo("Room Cleared", false) end
